name: GitHub DLP
description: GitHub DLP plugin is used to fetch files from the owner's GitHub repositories. MD5 hashes of files reported to Netskope CTE as indicators. For more information regarding generating access token, refer https://docs.github.com/en/free-pro-team@latest/github/authenticating-to-github/creating-a-personal-access-token.

configuration.label: API Token
configuration.description: The GitHub user accountâ€™s API key.

configuration.label: Repository Name
configuration.description: Comma-separated repository names whose repository contents the user wants to fetch. Leave empty to fetch data from all repositories.

configuration.label: Tag
configuration.description: Tag name to be used for tagging indicators. `$REPO` will be replaced by the name of the repository that the hash belongs to.

configuration.label: Quota Limit
configuration.description: Amount of maximum API calls that should be consumed in percentage (1-100).
